public void setRating()

compare

public int compare(RevisionNode o2)
compare takes two ListNode objects and compares them based on the integer representation of their revision numbers. If o1 is a later revision than o2, then compare returns 1 and returns -1 if it is an earlier revision. 0 is returned if o1 and o2 are the same revision.
